mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (REVIEWID,REVIEWCONTENTS,REVIEWDATE,UPDATEDATE,REVIEWRATE,USERNUM,CONTENTID,KIND) VALUES ( REVIEWID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{reviewContents}, sysdate, sysdate, #{reviewRate, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userNum}, #{contentId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, (SELECT KIND FROM NESTCONTENTS WHERE CONTENTID = #{contentId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) )
mapper.select: SELECT u.USERNAME, r.REVIEWCONTENTS, r.REVIEWID ,r.REVIEWRATE FROM REVIEW r JOIN USERS u ON r.USERNUM = u.USERNUM WHERE r.CONTENTID = #{contentId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT R.*, U.USERNAME FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN USERS U ON R.USERNUM = U.USERNUM WHERE R.REVIEWID = #{reviewId}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEWCONTENTS = #{reviewContents}, REVIEWRATE = #{reviewRate}, REVIEWDATE = SYSDATE WHERE REVIEWID= #{reviewId}
